desc: Industrial Furniture, Painted Furniture, spray painted furniture, furniture spraying, Annie Sloan Stockist, chalk paint, Annie Sloan chalk paint, Annie Sloan wall paint, Annie Sloan lacquer, Annie Sloan satin paint, upcycled furniture, shabby chic, furniture, kitchen dressers, spray painting, furniture restoration,

layout.text:
We sell furniture, some vintage, some modern and some upcycled.
We also sell Annie Sloan Chalk Paint so you can join in the fun!
Commission furniture painting available too.
We like to add vibrant colours to vintage pieces, soften industrial furniture with wooden features and upcycle well made furniture to bring it bang up to date.
